HomeTitle: RAL Color Chart & Database - HEX, RGB & CMYK Codes
MetaDescription: Explore the complete RAL Color Chart with over 1,500 colors. View accurate HEX, RGB & CMYK codes for every shade from RAL Classic, Design System Plus, and Effect palettes.
WelcomeHeading: Explore the Complete RAL Color Chart
WelcomeBody: Browse over 1,500 colors from the official RAL Color Chart. Find precise HEX, RGB, and CMYK values, compare shades, and convert between color formats for design and architecture projects.
BrowseByColor: Browse the RAL Color Chart by Color
AllColorsDesc: Discover the entire RAL Color Chart including Classic, Design System Plus, and Effect palettes with color conversions and comparisons.
RalClassicDesc: The original RAL Color Chart with 216 timeless industrial and trade colors recognized worldwide.
RalDesignPlusDesc: The extended RAL Color Chart with 880 systematically arranged shades for architects and designers.
RalEffectDesc: A modern RAL Color Chart featuring 490 metallic and solid colors designed for advanced coating applications.
ConverterDesc: Easily convert any shade from the RAL Color Chart to HEX, RGB, HSL, or CMYK formats.
CompareDesc: Visually compare up to 8 colors from the RAL Color Chart side by side on different backgrounds.
PickerDesc: Upload an image to find the closest matching shades from the RAL Color Chart instantly.
